channel.title: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?
channel.description:
Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page? It says "hamachi is dumb, plus it doesnt work anyway..." or something like that. Well then why are all those hamachi servers listed there? well maybe they're not hamachi servers but theres alot of servers with names like 0.000.000.000 there. I seen bobby or somebody claiming that you could put it up on that server status page...plz tell me how if you can. thx.
[b]Mopar's Server Status Page Hosted by AARisAIR for Moparisthebest Click here to play the MoparScape 3.2 webclient. Click here to download MoparScape 3.2. Click here to go to the forums. NO HAMACHI SERVERS, ITS STUPID, PLUS THIS WILL NOT WORK ON THEM. The server must be online to add it to this list.
Name: ______________________ IP: ________________________ Port: [/b] _______________________
there thats what it says when you click "register your own server

item.title: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?
item.dc:creator: @R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz R E B 0 R N 0wnz
item.description:
@R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz wrote:

Its not. Its there servers ip, im not completly sure why they cant name there server’s ip to like Serversname.no-ip.info… But its not hamachi its just regular non ham

Read full topic
item.source: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?

item.title: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

k well does anybody know why ppl name their servers names like 5.168.189.108 and post on that page? cuz that sounds like hamachi to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?
item.dc:creator: @R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz R E B 0 R N 0wnz
item.description:
@R_E_B_0_R_N_0wnz wrote:

Sadly you cant post hamachi servers on the server status page (ive tried before. :|)… Just go post some info on your server and the ham info in “Server advertisment” section in moparscape forums… ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Can you put your hamachi server on the mopar server status page?
